verses.verse: Who is this who comes <S%H935><s%> from Edom, <S%H123><s%> with dyed <S%H2556><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> from Bozrah? <S%H1224><s%> this who is glorious <S%H1921><s%> in his clothing, <S%H3830><s%> marching <S%H6808><s%> in the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of his strength? <S%H3581><s%> "It is I who speak <S%H1696><s%> in righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> mighty <S%H7227><s%> to save. <S%H3467><s%>"
Why are you red <S%H122><s%> in your clothing, <S%H3830><s%> and your garments <S%H899><s%> like him who treads <S%H1869><s%> in the wine vat? <S%H1660><s%>

"I have trodden <S%H1869><s%> the winepress <S%H6333><s%> alone; <S%H5971><s%> and of the peoples there was no <S%H376><s%> man with me: <S%H1869><s%> yes, I trod them in my anger, <S%H639><s%> and trampled <S%H7429><s%> them in my wrath; <S%H2534><s%> and their lifeblood <S%H5332><s%> is sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> on my garments, <S%H899><s%> and I have stained <S%H1351><s%> all my clothing. <S%H4403><s%>
For the day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%> was in my heart, <S%H3820><s%> and the year <S%H8141><s%> of my redeemed <S%H1350><s%> has come. <S%H935><s%>

I looked, <S%H5027><s%> and there was none to help; <S%H5826><s%> and I wondered <S%H8074><s%> that there was none to uphold: <S%H5564><s%> therefore my own arm <S%H2220><s%> brought salvation <S%H3467><s%> to me; <S%H2534><s%> and my wrath, it upheld me. <S%H5564><s%>

I trod down <S%H947><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> in my anger, <S%H639><s%> and made them drunk <S%H7937><s%> in my wrath, <S%H2534><s%> and I poured <S%H3381><s%> out their lifeblood <S%H5332><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of the loving kindnesses <S%H2617><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> and the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> according to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has bestowed <S%H1580><s%> on us, <S%H7227><s%> and the great goodness <S%H2898><s%> toward the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which he has bestowed <S%H1580><s%> on them according to his mercies, <S%H7356><s%> and according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his loving kindnesses. <S%H2617><s%>
For he said, <S%H559><s%> "Surely, <S%H5971><s%> they are my people, children <S%H1121><s%> who will not deal falsely: <S%H8266><s%>" so he was their Savior. <S%H3467><s%>

In all their affliction <S%H6869><s%> he was afflicted, <S%H6862><s%> and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of his presence <S%H6440><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> them: <S%H160><s%> in his love and in his pity <S%H2551><s%> he redeemed <S%H1350><s%> them; <S%H5190><s%> and he bore them, <S%H5375><s%> and carried them all the days <S%H3117><s%> of old. <S%H5769><s%>

But they rebelled, <S%H4784><s%> and grieved <S%H6087><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> Spirit: <S%H7307><s%> therefore he was turned <S%H2015><s%> to be their enemy, <S%H341><s%> and he himself fought against them. <S%H3898><s%>

Then he remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old, <S%H5769><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and his people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H5927><s%> Where is he who brought them up out of the sea <S%H3220><s%> with the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> of his flock? <S%H6629><s%> where is he who put <S%H7760><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> Spirit <S%H7307><s%> in their midst? <S%H7130><s%>

who caused his glorious <S%H8597><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> at the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of Moses? <S%H4872><s%> who divided <S%H1234><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H6213><s%> to make himself an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> name? <S%H8034><s%>
who led <S%H3212><s%> them through the depths, <S%H8415><s%> as a horse <S%H5483><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> so that they didn't <S%H3782><s%> stumble?

As the livestock <S%H929><s%> that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the valley, <S%H1237><s%> the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> caused them to rest; <S%H5117><s%> so you led <S%H5090><s%> your people, <S%H5971><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> yourself a glorious <S%H8597><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>

Look <S%H7200><s%> down <S%H5027><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> from the habitation <S%H2073><s%> of your holiness <S%H6944><s%> and of your glory: <S%H8597><s%> where are your zeal <S%H7068><s%> and your mighty <S%H1369><s%> acts? <S%H1995><s%> the yearning of your heart <S%H4578><s%> and your compassion is restrained toward me. <S%H662><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> you are our Father, <S%H1><s%> though Abraham <S%H85><s%> doesn't <S%H3808><s%> know us, <S%H3478><s%> and Israel does not acknowledge <S%H5234><s%> us: <S%H3068><s%> you, Yahweh, are our Father; <S%H1><s%> our Redeemer <S%H1350><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> is your name. <S%H8034><s%>

O Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> why do you make us to err <S%H8582><s%> from your ways, <S%H1870><s%> and harden <S%H7188><s%> our heart <S%H3820><s%> from your fear? <S%H3374><s%> Return <S%H7725><s%> for your servants <S%H5650><s%>' sake, <S%H7626><s%> the tribes of your inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
Your holy <S%H6944><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> possessed <S%H3423><s%> it but a little while: <S%H4705><s%> our adversaries <S%H6862><s%> have trodden down <S%H947><s%> your sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>
We have become as they over whom you never <S%H5769><s%> bear rule, <S%H4910><s%> as those who were not called <S%H7121><s%> by your name. <S%H8034><s%>
